DOC.brief_title: Ticagrelor Versus Clopidogrel Carotid Artery Stenting
DOC.detailed_description: Carotid artery stenting ( CAS ) emerge treatment atherosclerotic carotid stenosis . The main adverse event embolic stroke procedure . Current medical management prevent peri-procedural embolisation consist dual antiplatelet therapy clopidogrel aspirin . Ticagrelor , novel reversible inhibitor platelet adenosine diphosphate receptor P2Y12 , superior clopidogrel , add-on therapy aspirin , prevent stent thrombosis , cardiovascular outcome event , death patient undergo coronary artery stenting , without cause increase major bleed event . This study aim test hypothesis ticagrelor superior clopidogrel add-on aspirin prevent cerebral embolism CAS procedure .
